qualifier:
Unprotected write. Non-private method `com.alipay.sofa.jraft.storage.snapshot.remote.BoltSession.sendNextRpc` writes to field `this.com.alipay.sofa.jraft.storage.snapshot.remote.BoltSession.timer` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because the current class is annotated `@ThreadSafe`, so we assume that this method can run in parallel with other non-private methods in the class (including itself).
